PASSWORD_RULE: Numbers and letters included, min 6 - max 18.
KEYSTORE_ERROR: Illegal keystore file or incorrect private key password.
KEYSTORE_EMPTY: The keystore should not be empty.
CLICK_MNEMONIC: Please click the mnemonics by original order
NEW_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The new password should not be empty.
ORIGINAL_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The original private key password should not be empty.

PAYMENT_PASSWORD_ERROR: The payment password is incorrent, please check!

BACKUP_MNEMONIC_TIPS: This mnemonic phrases are uniquely generated and grant you access to your Wallet. Don't share this mnemonic,write it down on a piece of paper or backup it offline. The Cypherium team can't recover your funds if you lose your mnemonic.

EXPORT_PRIVATEKEY_TIPS: This mnemonic phrases are uniquely generated and grant you access to your Wallet. Don't share this mnemonic,write it down on a piece of paper or backup it offline. The Cypherium team can't recover your funds if you lose your mnemonic.

NONCE_ERROR: Transaction failed, you can raise up the gas to make sure transaction successfully handled.
ADDRESS_EMPTY: The CPH address should not be empty
AMOUNT_SMALL: The amount is too small,must larger than 0.0001
